title: tbh immolate shouldn't be a unique passive
body: would be funny as fuck to do 99 magic damage a second for jacking off next to something for a few seconds

replies.body: {{champion:36}} +{{item:3068}}+ plus new jungle items= an unkillable tank with a lot of AoE damage.
Sunfire and new jungle item doesnt stack
So this mean that a tank jungler not build Sunfire Cape anymore (It's a bad idea have 2 items with the same passive). Alo we have lesser Tenacity items...

> [{quoted}](name=Venowolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ksGqcwNv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-28T03:12:05.707+0000)
>
> So this mean that a tank jungler not build Sunfire Cape anymore (It's a bad idea have 2 items with the same passive). Alo we have lesser Tenacity items...

Tenacity never mattered on tanks.
When Sunfire Capes stacked it wasn't even that big of a deal except for when Garen had 5 of them.

The problem was still that someone who was tanky can deal 200 damage per second while strolling along with your team, and no tank needed other tank items because why would you get tanky but have no damage when you can build both at once?
